entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
